entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Select the protocol to be used by Signalr #55210
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55207
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55206
  • Perf regression: https #55205
  • API Proposal: AllowInteractiveRoutingAttribute for Blazor #55204
  • npm ERR! request to https://registry.npmjs.org/@microsoft%2fsignalr failed, reason: unable to verify the first certificate #55203
  • Minimal API : Converting empty string to Nullable (ex: int?) with [FromForm] binding #55202
  • Support for unique phone numbers, find user by phone number in Identity #55199
  • Overridden TryParseValueFromString does not appear to be used #55197
  • [QUIC] `QuicConnectionContext.Abort` calls connection shutdown with error code -1 #55196
  • Blazor Server - Deploy to IIS doesn't load wwwroot StaticFiles (404 not found) #55195
  • Meaningless error when using both Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect 8.0.4 and System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt 7.5.0 or higher #55194
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55192
  • Use hot reload with ws only #55190

Closed

  • [Static web assets] Define static web asset endpoints in the SDK and generate an endpoints manifest #54873
    9.0-preview4
  • Add built-in support for Swagger UI #55191
  • Add APIs for viewing generated OpenAPI file at runtime #54600
    9.0-preview4
  • init setter to have the same visibility as the most visible constructor, rather than the containing type #54059
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55176
  • Perf improvement: single_query #55156
  • Perf regression: single_query #55186
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55193
  • AuthorizeView tag with Roles attribute not working, always showing NotAuthorized content #54301
  • Allow override of base href during Blazor web assembly startup #55189
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, plaintext #55167
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55185
  • Intermediate MTLS certificates ignored by certificate authentication #53858
  • Blazor: NavigationManager.NavigateTo external URL sometimes throws ObjectDisposedException on HttpResponseStreamWriter #54997

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't output secret value from user-secrets set #55209
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Change how the key ring cache is updated #54675
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix exit code propagation when building inside the VMR #55201
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Fix multiple CSP policies #55200
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Update locker.yml #55188
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Merge feature/openapi to main #55182
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure OutputCaching generates a documentation file #55170
    area-middleware
  • Ensuring deleted cookies are recognized by the browser by ensuring the MaxAge within CookieOptions is set to null. #55169
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Per-page opt out from interactive routing #55157
    area-blazor
  • update project templates package reference #55155
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
